alert.note: Alert for Ashtabula; Geauga; Lake; Trumbull (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 02 at 9:26PM EDT until July 02 at 10:15PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: The National Weather Service in Cleveland has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Trumbull County in northeastern Ohio... Geauga County in northeastern Ohio... Southern Lake County in northeastern Ohio... Southwestern Ashtabula County in northeastern Ohio... * Until 1015 PM EDT. * At 925 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Chardon, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Chardon, Mentor, Willoughby, Eastlake, Middlefield, North Bloomfield, Orwell, Burton, Chesterland, Willoughby Hills, Kirtland, Huntsburg, Mayfield, Claridon, Gates Mills, Montville, Hartsgrove, Hunting Valley, Thompson and Kirtland Hills. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
